title: How to grow roses
creator_credit: John Ott Pictures and International Film Bureau
brief_description: Outlines the rose’s origin, geographic distribution, and varying habits, form and character. Shows many of the 90 genera comprising the rose family. Includes practical hints on cultivation, general care and pruning.
creator_credit_for_label: John Ott Pictures and International Film Bureau
